1.SceneDescription: The Hallway, Chandler and Monica are returning from their honeymoon.

lines.Line:
Wait. Before we go in, I just want you to know I love you. I had a
great time on our honeymoon, and I can’t wait to go in there and spend the rest of
our life together

You’re really sticking with the shell necklace huh? (Points to
necklace of shells he’s wearing.

lines.Character: (Joey and Phoebe burst forth from his apartment
lines.Line: Joey and Phoebe burst forth from his apartment.
Hey! You’re back! (Hugs and kisses all around.

lines.Character:
(They grab the luggage and drag it into Joey and Rachel’s forcing Monica and
Chandler to follow
lines.Line:
They grab the luggage and drag it into Joey and Rachel’s forcing Monica and
Chandler to follow.

Oh, so much fun. But the best part is, we met this incredible couple on
the way back
That was the best part? (To Chandler) Good honeymooning tiger
No, they were really cool. They were on their honeymoon too
No, they were really cool. They were on their honeymoon too
They’re terrific, and they live right here in the city
Yeah, can we go call them? Is it too soon to call? I wanna call

I’m sorry, we’re just kinda excited because we finally have
a couple to hang out with

A couple? Like two people? Like (points to himself) one (points to
Phoebe), two people
This is different! Greg and Jenny are in a relationship

Oh, Greg and Jenny yuck! (Angrily) Hi Greg, I’m Chandler this is
Monica. Hi Monica, this is Jenny. Hi Jenny. Hi Greg
Listen, they are really great. If you just got a chance
Listen, they are really great. If you just got a chance

Y’know what? Why don’t you just give us our souvenirs and get
the hell out of here
We really…didn’t get a chance to
We really…didn’t get a chance to
You have got to be kidding me
We didn’t get anything for anyone
We didn’t get anything for anyone

Tradition was broken here as there were no commercials
immediately after the opening credits, just more show.

2.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, time has lapsed, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler, and Monica are
sitting at the kitchen table.

lines.Line: I can’t believe he taped the two of them having sex
Yeah! You gotta tell a girl before you tape her. Such a rookie mistake
Y’know who has a great video camera
Y’know who has a great video camera
Do you still wanna call ‘em? I wanna call ‘em
Yeah! Ask them if they brought their friends any souvenirs

lines.Character: (Monica goes over and dials their number
lines.Line: Monica goes over and dials their number.

lines.Character: (Monica goes over and dials their number
lines.Line: Monica goes over and dials their number.
Hey, hang up! You get food poisoning just talkin’ to that place
(on phone) Uh sorry, wrong number. (Hangs up
(on phone) Uh sorry, wrong number. (Hangs up
Here you go. (Shows her the number again.
(on phone) Hello? (Listens) (To All) It’s the deli again
All right! I’ll have a sandwich
All right! I’ll have a sandwich
(hangs up) I don’t think this number’s right
(hangs up) I don’t think this number’s right
They gave us a fake number? Why? Why would they do that

I don’t know! You were a delight to talk to. You asked all those
insightful, great questions
And you’ve never been funnier. Joke, joke, joke, you were a hoot
Y’know what? Don’t worry about it, you still got me and Phoebe
Y’know what? Don’t worry about it, you still got me and Phoebe
Excuse me, I don’t want Greg and Jenny’s rejects

(entering) Rachel won’t talk to me! She won’t even open the
door
Okay, listen I am not a pervert

That’s like the pervert motto! Yeah! Yeah! They have you raise your
right hand, put your left hand down your pants, and repeat that

Filming Rachel is not something I planned. Okay look, here’s what
happened, and Joey you-you can back me up on this. All right, about-about a month and a
half ago I came to you with a problem? Umm, a personal thing.
Personal thing? What personal thing? I don’t know
Personal thing? What personal thing? I don’t know

About…about sex? (Joey looks at him confused) That I hadn’t had
sex in months
(laughs) Yeah I knew what you were talkin’ about
(laughs) Yeah I knew what you were talkin’ about

3.SceneDescription:
Ross's Apartment, Ross is on his date with Kristen and they’re drinking
wine.

lines.Line:
It’s from France…In Europe…Western Europe. Y’know umm,
a few years ago I actually was backpacking across Western Europe
Uh-hmm—Wait! It gets better. Um, yeah I was in Barcelona
I studied for a year in Barcelona. (Ross is stunned and worried.
Anyway, umm so I was um, I was hiking
Anyway, umm so I was um, I was hiking

(whines) Oh that’s great! I was hiking along the foothills of Mount
Tibidaybo
Okay! Do you wanna tell the story?
Okay! Do you wanna tell the story?

4.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe are now sitting in
the living room.

lines.Line: I still don't get why Greg and Jenny would give us a fake number

Y’know, if they knew what they were doing they probably didn’t
give you real names either

Okay, maybe people give out fake numbers, but they don’t give out
fake names
Oh yeah? (To Phoebe) Hi, Ken Adams, nice to meet you
Oh yeah? (To Phoebe) Hi, Ken Adams, nice to meet you
Regina Philange. (Ken and Regina shake hands.
I still don’t get it, we didn’t do anything wrong
I know! Although, you did tell an awful lot of jokes
I know! Although, you did tell an awful lot of jokes
I thought you said those jokes were funny. Joke! Joke! Joke

(rolling her head from side to side) Joke. Joke. Blah! Blah! (Joey and
Phoebe laugh.
Well maybe it was all of your questions
Well maybe it was all of your questions
The sheer volume, it was like flying with the Riddler
Oh, I’m sorry. Was that another joke

Uh no Rach, he’s gone. But listen, he told us what happened and it
does, it sounds like an honest mistake

Oh really? Well how would you like it if I had sex with you and I taped
it? (Joey smiles luridly) Oh forget it! (Ross enters.) Oh there he is now, the father of
my child, the porn king of the west village

Look, it was accident! Okay? I-I feel bad that it happened, but I swear, I
didn’t even watch it! Anyway, here. (He takes the tape out of his coat pocket.) I
thought you might be more comfortable destroying it yourself. (Tosses her the tape.

Thank you. (She sets it on the floor and is about to stomp on it with
her shoe when the rest of the gang jumps up and yells simultaneously.) What? (They all
yell again.) You don’t want to see this do you
I am not gonna show you this
No! Not the sex part, just the stuff leading up to it

Okay fine! Fine! We’ll just have to think of some other way to put
the whole ‘Who came onto who,’ thing to rest! Come on now, think!

Look, forget it Phoebe. Okay? It’s Rachel’s tape and she can do
whatever she wants with it. And she wants to destroy it. So, end of story

Clearly you don’t want people to see this tape. Now I don’t
want people to see this tape either, but you so badly don’t people to see it makes me
want to see it. You see
(confused) Are we watchin’ the tape or not?
I don’t want people to see it for your sake
I don’t want people to see it for your sake

Ahh, I don’t believe you. I think you don’t want them to see
you begging me. (Goes to put the tape in the VCR

Fine. Fine, but I want the record to show that I tried to take the high
road, because in about five minutes I’m gonna be saying…(He laughs and points at
Rachel sarcastically.
(on tape) Hello! Can I get you anything
(on tape) Hello! Can I get you anything

lines.Line: So uh, apparently people are familiar with the Europe story

Yeah. Listen about that, the whole uh, who came on to who thing really
doesn’t matter. I mean, I think it would’ve happened either way. I mean if you
hadn’t initiated it I-I-I know I would’ve
It was. It was an amazing night
It was. It was an amazing night

I uh… I don’t know. I mean I…I honestly didn’t watch
it
Yeah, it would be really weird

lines.Character:
(Ross grabs the tape and heads for the VCR as Rachel goes over and puts the chain on
the door and locks it

Oh, oh there go the clothes
Oh, oh there go the clothes
Hey. We-we look…we look pretty good
That’s what I was gonna say
That’s what I was gonna say
Thank you! I had just gone to the beach that weekend
Really? Wow, this is so much better than I
